channel.title: Problem with laptop
channel.description: my laptop is fucked up. every so often my cursor goes up or down, in one direction until it cant go any further. is this a virus? i would think for the most part if i had a virus, it wouldnt just move up or down. it only moves in a straight line where i last left the cursor, if someone hacked my account they have some good steady hands. full system scan, nothing. i usually use the pad, i connected the mouse to see if that was the problem. no difference. restarted computer. nothing helps.

item.title: Problem with laptop
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I used to have that problem, I just updated my drivers and that fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with laptop

item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:239820”]When i got a virus my cursor started doing this until i shut down, not knowing it changed my pass.

Or it may be the hardware.[/quote]
how did u fix this

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with laptop

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

When i got a virus my cursor started doing this until i shut down, not knowing it changed my pass.

Or it may be the hardware.
